1.content: So, what category do you want to go with?
1.title: Let's Do This

info.brief_description: Have your own monster servant, or be the servant to a monster yourself. Your choice.
info.description:
Simple as can be, choose a category, then a scenario, enjoy the story! Feel free to contribute if you like, all adds are greatly appreciated!

Rules

1. No gore or toilet stuff.

2. Vore I'll allow, but only the oral kind.

3. Have fun!
